plot: A police officer is injured in a riot and asks to be transferred. The precinct director says first the officer must solve 3 pending cases.
title: Tian sheng dan xiao

plot_en: A police officer is injured in a riot and asks to be transferred. The precinct director says first the officer must solve 3 pending cases.
